entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2022-23267 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #221

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure in ilconformance jmp #78579
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.General._Vector256.VectorUnaryOpTest__ConvertToDoubleUInt64.ValidateResult(UInt64[], Double[], System.String) #78576
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline (`dotnet-runtime-perf`) completely broken for `main` #78575
    8.0.0
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Runtime fails to generate native System.Private.CoreLib in source-build bootstrap #78574
  • Quic listen internal error #78573
  • [API Proposal]: <T>[].TryGetOffset(int offset, out <T> value) #78571
  • [API Proposal]: System.String.TryGetChar(int offset, out char letter) #78570
  • Reusing RC2 CryptoDecryptor with the combination of DeflateStream causes invalid reads starting from net6. #78569
  • [Telemetry] Sockets telemetry like "bytes-sent" is using wrong CounterType #78568
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived - determine final newline #78565
  • [ppc64le][.net7] Unhandled Exception: System.PlatformNotSupportedException: System.Data.ODBC is not supported on this platform #78563
  • AccessViolationException in System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates tests #78560
  • gcc fails to arch-cross-compile on GNU/Linux in NativeAOT .NET 7 #78559
  • Support modifying already initialized properties and fields when deserializing JSON #78556
    8.0.0
  • Arm64: If Conversion can bypass overflow checks #78554
  • [.NET 6] BufferFileStreamStrategy fills GC Finalizer Queue #78553
  • [API Proposal]: Abstract System.Reflection.Emit public types #78542
    8.0.0
  • runtime-coreclr superpmi-collect failed with System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (55): No buffer space available #78541
    8.0.0
  • Add config switch to fully disable hot-reload #78540
  • Assembly loader event tracing is very expensive (10x application slowdown) #78539
  • Incomplete managed stacktrace in windbg #78538
  • Any way to mask a (broken) extension method? #78530

Closed

  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.ComplexTests.Reciprocal(real: 0, imaginary: -1) #78298
    8.0.0
  • Only canonical types show up in profilers for generics #77007
    Future
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\Vector256\\Vector256_r\\Vector256_r.cmd #76280
    8.0.0
  • Debug symbols on Linux in Native AOT have lots of DWARF errors #78410
    8.0.0
  • CVE-2022-3786 - Any impact? #78536
  • net6.0-ios: AOT compiler fail when UnmanagedCallersOnly has CallConvs #75700
    8.0.0
  • FreeBSD build break with cmake version 3.25.0 #78528
  • non-ASCII being rejected #78514
  • Multi-threading bugs in System.IO.Packaging #78547
  • Support modifying (rather than replacing) already-initialized properties and fields when deserializing #30258
    8.0.0
  • System.Runtime.AttributeTargets - does not list Record #78552
  • Unification of CoreCLR and Mono - AOT / NativeAOT #78504
  • Update runtime Invoke exception handling #67457
    8.0.0
  • Mono work necessary to support IL-based invoke #68928
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Generics\\Exceptions\\general_class_instance01\\general_class_instance01.cmd #77363
    8.0.0
  • Failing to build FreeBSD - `src/native/libs/System.Native/pal_networkstatistics.c` #78522
  • Debugging in visual studio creates interference with authenticationservice.js #77252
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [PERF]Make mono dotnet pathing dynamic #78581
    area-Infrastructure
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Pod Updates November 2022 #78578
    area-Meta
  • update System.CommandLine and adopt to breaking changes #78577
    area-System.Console
  • Clean up members/signatures/visibility in deps_format/resolver #78572
    area-Host
  • Adds samples into `Microsoft.Extensions.*` readme files #78567
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/7.0] Fix commit accounting for large pages #78564
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Anonymous pipe resource leak when DisposeLocalCopyOfClientHandle is not called #78562
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Removed range checks have ordered side effects (#78554) #78561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey and List copy to Array #78558
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • [Android] Prevent exceptions with a 'Success' message in System.Net.NetworkInformation #78555
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Relocate phase prefetch #78551
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Allow inline relocations in dehydrated data #78545
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #78532
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Replace MD5 with MurmurHash3_128 in SPMI #78527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Improve the handling of Create, CreateScalar, and CreateScalarUnsafe for vectors #78236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete temporary instrumentation for #76280 #78537
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make sure to check for isUsedFromSpillTemp() before optimizing float comparison in code gen #78548
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for dehydrated runtime data structures #77884
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Fix usage of implicit pointer types in a few more places… #76878
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Improve Span.Reverse fast path performance #70944
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Code quality concerns #78485
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add win-arm64 entry for browser-wasm cross pack #78535
    area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • Do not dehydrate data if CFG is enabled #78546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix commit accounting for large pages #78531
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove `ContextEntry` from assembly binder - store `Assembly` directly #78533
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix freebsd cross build with cmake 3.25 #78534
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] source build backports #78395
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Call RhNewArray through RuntimeImports #78529
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Add check for interval->writeThru in the assert #78418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Pin FreeBSD build image to fix build break #78526
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CreateSegment events #78430
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove unused argument from IL test entrypoints #78501
    test-enhancement

Updated

  • Fix jmp.il after #78501 #78582
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 to 6.0 #78247
    NO-MERGE, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • [hot_reload] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • [Release/7.0][PERF]Fix Mono Dotnet Generation #78413
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Minor optimizations for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove invalidation of whitespace in TryGetNextExtendedAttribute #78465
    area-System.IO
  • [wasm] More jiterpreter cleanup #78519
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Use a list for tests in src/tests/run.py #78463
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Revert don't need to escape special characters anymore #78320
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.Reverse() for Vector128 #76076
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • Change the default SuperPMI collection location #78513
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize the SqlGuid struct #72549
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, community-contribution
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #78015
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] VN implicit cast fix for normalize-on-load #78524
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Obsolete outdated Visual Basic API #73838
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, new-api-needs-documentation, api-ready-for-review, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Add readmes for System.Runtime, System.Runtime.Numerics, System.Buffers, System.Runtime.Intrinsics #77332
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Add support for delegate GDV in R2R and NAOT #77267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix justMyCode behavior #78066
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Subject src-gen serializer to full number-handling tests #78010
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Release/6.0][PERF] Fix perf repo branch setup target, tool build, and mono-dotnet create #78411
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #78470
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 7.0.x
  • Add System.Diagnostics.Process README.md #78525
    documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove the workarounds for `Interop.GetRandomBytes`/`CalendarData.EnumCalendarInfo` #2095

Closed

  • [Green Threads] PInvokes do not swap to the OS stack #2018
  • [Green Threads] JIT does not generate the new prolog #2015

PullRequests

Created

  • Zero-init locals on the shadow stack, simplify lowering code, allow STRUCT-typed PHIs #2096

Merged

  • Implement `GT_LCLHEAP` codegen #2093
  • Add deep stack test, reduce standard stack depth, and fix the GC stackwalking problems #2094
    area-green-threads
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge up to feature/NativeAOT-final tag #2092

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why Platform Target? #29129
  • msbuild /target:Clean;Build doesn't behave as /target:Clean + /target:Build with C# preprocessed files/text templating #29123
  • `dotnet build` is not working when called from a second .NET program #29117
  • VS 17.4.1 .NET Maui Blazor NU1012 NETSDK1045 #29116

Closed

  • Marking the application's assembly as trimmable passes completely wrong input to linker #13999
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With VS 17.5 preview 2 + .NET 7.0.200-preview.22558.7 installed on Loc OS, the template names for IOS and Mac are unlocalized after running "dotnet new --list" in CLI . #28997
  • dotnet test ignores -property command line parameters #29115
  • dotnet test fail to pass MSBuild properties #29114

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29127
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [ASP.NET] Remove versions from baselines (#29093) #29120
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [ASP.NET] Remove versions from baselines (#29093) #29119
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [ASP.NET] Remove versions from baselines (#29093) #29118
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [ASP.NET] Remove versions from baselines #29093
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add new option for json output of dotnet list package to release 7.2.xx branch #29017
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid potential NRE #29128
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Disable the windows SDK automated references for c++ #28596
    Area-NetSDK
  • Add error when specifying --output option for a solution #29065
    Area-CLI

Updated

  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #29095
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2048634 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
  • Add optional logging to MSBuild SDK Resolver #26904
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29094
    Area-Infrastructure

Issues

Updated

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0200 is misreported and its editorconfig setting affects IDE0039 #65504
  • Inline diagnostics in the editor do not get cleared up #65503
  • Big tagger delay in refreshing squiggles in the editor #65502
    17.5
  • Performance improvements for FixAll diagnostic computation for syntax-only analyzers #65501
  • Unable to reference netmodule #65499
    17.5
  • Formatting for stackalloc as a parameter lost one indentation #65498
  • C# Extract Method refactoring failed if "Not all code paths return" #65496
    17.5

Closed

  • Swapping with tuple deconstruction compiles to inferior IL code compared to using a temporary variable #53300
    17.5
  • Improve NormalizeWhitespace for object initializers #61204
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33118.127 #65509
  • Code CleanUp doesnt not work as expected #62727
    17.4
  • Test Plan for "List Patterns" #51289
    17.1
  • DocumentationCommentId parser throws IndexOutOfRangeException when parsing type parameter symbol in invalid ID #65396
    17.5
  • Roslyn fails to give syntax error for incomplete member that contains a lexical warning #13719
    Compiler.Next
  • Disallow optional parameter attributes in lambdas #59770
    C# 12.0
  • Inferred delegate type for method group should include any default parameter values #61007
    C# 12.0
  • Local constant is considered unused when it's used as default parameter value for local function #62161
    Compiler.Next
  • Unused Variable Analysis Does Not Account for Local Function Default Parameter Values #63837
    Backlog
  • Default Parameter Values Not Supported By QuickInfo for Anonymous Delegate Types #63890
    Backlog
  • Lambda parameters are not checked for a number of error conditions #62960
    17.5
  • CS0721 error reported on unintuitive location #61831
    Backlog
  • Documentation Xml does not contain documentation from Source Generators generated code #65426
    17.5
  • [LSP] Always create lsp misc files and resolve rps regression #57243
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve consistency in our parser code. #65508
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure lvalue struct receivers are not copied by value due to interpolated string handler rewrite #65505
    Area-Compilers
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65500
    Area-Compilers
  • VB: Verify BoundNodes can be rewritten without updates #65497
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65495
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Improve `NormalizeWhitespace` for object initializers #65249
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Optimize codegen for tuple swap scenarios #65327
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Move context-sensitive parsing to context-free parsing. #65480
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add A/B test to allow us to turn off background compilation/parsing #65489
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Run the conditional-token-placement fixer on roslyn #65469
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65453
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Check type parameter index bounds when parsing `DocumentationCommentId` #65457
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Convert parser warning into a binding warning. #65440
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • View Call Hierarchy - fix thread block #65452
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enhance rule metadata and suppression info in SARIF V2 errorlog #64277
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Warn for unused parameters in source #65466
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65413
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Pass in HostServices when creating the LSP server #65384
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65511
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65510
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add lambda defaults/`params` tests from the test plan review #65458
    Area-Compilers
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix bug in partial solutions after a document was removed and added #65349
    Area-IDE
  • Do not import the VSWorkspace during Roslyn package initialization #65492
    Area-IDE
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Show explicit error message when extracting interface from module #65152
    Area-IDE
  • Add additional cases whre 'use coalesce expression' can simplify code. #65371
    Area-IDE
  • Add experimental formatting option to control placement of `=>` #65476
    Area-IDE
  • Fix a NullReferenceException in Signature help #65372
    Area-IDE
  • Is pattern expression with in parameter avoid unnecessary temp in rewriter #65243
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix wrong symbol comparisons #65430
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [PERF] Do not force Compilation.GetDiagnostics for FixAll of syntax-only analyzers #65483
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Tenet-Performance
  • Work some 'scoped' issues on IDE #65407
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Trampoline to a base method implementation when deleting an override #65481
    Area-Compilers
  • Create new vsix for arm64 and x64 .NET ServiceHub services #65471
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Reduce tagging work in files without raw strings #65488
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Routing - cannot change precedence of DynamicRouteValueTransformer #45175
  • Styling Identity Razor Pages to use default Blazor theme is insanely difficult #45174
  • WeatherForecastController does not format correctly #45171
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ISingleClientProxy.InvokeAsync<T> throwing System.Exception upon receiving return value from client invocations using messagepack protocol #45168
  • Semingly random CorrelationCookieNotFound issues #45166
  • "Empty" errors in MVC Controller #45178
  • Blazor: Scrollbar Not Resetting on Page Change on Firefox #45163
  • In ASP.NET 7, IEnumerable<> controller parameters do not bind from request body by default #45162
  • Why isn't the http logging middleware logging form data? #45161
    8.0-preview1

Closed

  • Net 7.0 Connection processing ended abnormally. #45110
  • Publishing the default React template results in a 404 #45165
  • Blazor lazy loading percentage #45164
  • MicrosoftIdentityOption.ReturnUrlParameter does not appear to work #45024

PullRequests

Created

  • [Api Controllers] Infer parameter source from ElementType for IEnumerable #45173
    area-web-frameworks
  • [TS Client] Fix CompletionMessage result when passing false or null #45169
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript

Merged

  • Add route string syntax to more APIs #45146
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Bump loader-utils from 2.0.3 to 2.0.4 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/common #45160
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • HttpSys request header dictionary does not remove headers when Remove() is called #44860
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • ApiAuthorizationDbContext.cs missing ServerSideSessions Patch #45145
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #45156
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, community-contribution
  • Fix CookieHeaderParserShared throws exception when last cookie contains invalid character #45014 #45127
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2048484 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • DefaultProblemDetailsWriter.CanWrite without Accept header #45158
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Provide more feedback on profiler attach failure reasons #3512

Updated

  • Add more profiles for dotnet trace with known .NET events #3026
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate ReadyToRun/CrossGen for Windows packs #11493
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Grid.RowSpan="0" throws exception in release mode, but not debug mode #11486
  • Can't use App.xaml resources after Dependency Injection .NET MAUI #11485
  • Maui FilePicker returns zero files when selecting a lot of files. #11482
  • Fix issues on net8 branch #11481
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ocr for dotnet MAUI #11480
  • MAUI runtime way slower than Xamarin.Forms #11479
  • Pasted text is shown in cleartext (not hidden) in Entry with IsPassword=true #11478
  • iOS build: the "-gcc_flags -dead_strip" Mtouch argument doesn't work #11477
  • Add permission request for POST_NOTIFICATION to essentials for Android 13 and up #11476
    Backlog
  • Localization not work under iOS and Mac arm64 #11474
  • [WinUI] First Entry/Editor gets focus if put inside ScrollView #11472
    Backlog
  • Binding IsEnabled on a control inside a DataTemplate fails when binding on 2 diff sources (one use RelativeSource) #11470
    Backlog
  • Private EventHandlers throw an exception on XAML-defined custom control, inherited by other control #11467
    Backlog
  • Picker Items not showing when BindingContext is changed from null to value at runtime #11466
  • [iOS] Cannot publish MAUI app to Apple App Store #11465
    Backlog
  • Changing ApplicationDisplayVersion in .NET MAUI project causes problems #11464

Closed

  • map.MapElements.Clear() does not work on iOS #11296
    Backlog
  • [Android] returning false or not calling base code in OnBackButtonPressed in Page does not prevent back button from working #10557
  • Community Toolkit Popup closing on window minimize or maximize in .NET MAUI #11473
  • Adding injected Pages to a TabbedView #9551
    Backlog
  • CarouselView with GestureRecognisers for Tapped or Clicked stop being able to scroll. #9664
  • [MacOS] File picker returns null on new MacOS 13 #11462
  • Error : Could not find a valid Xcode app bundle at '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools' #11339
    Backlog
  • [Scenario Day] Some colors of the default styles of Templates do not seem correct #7135
  • Password entry flashes and the app *crashes* #11123
  • Xamarin Maui Entry cursor movent in iOS cores Simulator #11165
  • [iOS]No Keyboard popup on Entry and Editor focus #11406
    Backlog
  • Build error for Maui App icon svg format is not supported in iOS plaftform #5180
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI Blazor crashes when changing system font on Android device #6105
  • Maui RC3 + VS For Mac Rc2 + Android 31: Carousel stopped working. #7416

PullRequests

Created

  • [net7.0] Fix the ordering registration for tests #11492
  • [net7.0] Set window soft input via window mapper #11489
  • [net7.0] [iOS/macOS] Fix issue updating the Frame HasShadow property #11488
  • Use darc to get feeds for dependencies of build #11487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.2.221109.1 to 1.2.221116.1 #11469
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Fix the ordering registration for tests #11484
  • Fix window events when swapping out a page #11483
  • Update Essentials Clipboard Docs #11395
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Connectivity API Docs #11415
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Contacts API Docs #11417
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [iOS] Fix issue clearing MapElements in Map #11471
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/Maps🗺
  • Update Essentials Browser API Docs #11394
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials AppInfo API Docs #11374
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] restore unittests for native views binding #11449
  • [net7.0] Update Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools #11456
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] If a UISwitch grows too wide it is no longer accessible #11447
    area/controls 🎮
  • Update Essentials Battery API Docs #11380
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Stable NET7 SR1 Version #11459

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NotMapped property attached to db column work or not depending declaration format #29615
  • SQLite RevEng: Use .NET types #29614
  • Scaffold-DbContext does not produce empty constructor in EF7 anymore #29613
  • Referencing same collection navigation multiple times in projection causes duplicate joins in query #29608
  • On removal of a migration, the .HasDicriminator command is not recreated in the ContextModelSnapshot #29607
  • JSON/Query: improve de-duplication logic for collection element access scenarios #29606

Closed

  • Add support for Enumerable.Contains() in the Cosmos DB provider #29617
  • Check for SQL Server VIEW DEFINITION rights fails, if databasename contains special chars #29610
    8.0.0
  • Count() is not working correctly with Include() and HasQueryFilter() #29599
  • How to get metadata that configed on OnModelCreating #29583
  • Exception while applying migration with model containing descendant types with same property names #29579
  • <please delete> #29611

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix passing property and entity type names to ValueGenerated messages #29609

Merged

  • Update daily build docs for 8.0 #29616
    auto-merge
  • Check for SQL Server VIEW DEFINITION rights fails, if databasename contains special chars #29612

Updated

  • Fix to #28881 - Consider removing unnecessary CASTs around JSON_VALUE #29417
  • Don't duplicate query filter parameters #29422
  • Fix value generation with converter between different numeric types #29601
  • [release/2.1] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.2 #29433
